user_query: My friends and I are planning a road trip and we need some good music to keep us entertained. Could you find a playlist on Soundcloud with a mix of classic hits and current chart-toppers? Additionally, please retrieve the lyrics of the most popular song on the playlist using the SongMeanings API.

TaskList.description: Search for a playlist on Soundcloud that includes a mix of classic hits and current chart-toppers.
Retrieve the list of songs in the found playlist and identify the most popular song.
Get the lyrics of the most popular song using the SongMeanings API.
